New Records: Nitish Reddy scored his maiden T20 half-century in 26 balls.
India posted the second highest T20 total against Bangladesh with 221-9.
Key Match Events: Nitish Reddy scored 74 runs off 34 balls, including seven sixes and four fours.
India won the match by 86 runs.
India scored 120 runs in the final 10 overs.
Mahmudullah top scored for Bangladesh with 41 off 39 balls.
Post-Match Reflections: Nitish Reddy expressed pride in representing India and credited the captain and coach for his performance.
